name: Rollzzard
description:
Rollzard is a game made in 48 hours during the GMTK Gamejam 2022.

The theme was "Roll of the dice", on the game, the player controls a small wizzard with powers randomly selected by 6 sides of a magical dice.

CONTROLS:

WASD or the arrow keys to move
K or Z to cast spells
O or X to skip your turn

CREDITS:

Sound Effects from "The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection" By Juhani Junkala

Main Theme by josefpres at:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDcZpIQtmoZPyWFZHUHuwSA

Ending Music by Matthew Pablo

http://www.matthewpablo.com
